format: A data frame with 30 observations on the following 2 variables.

parameters.torque:
Torque required to loosen the rusty bolt,
which was measured in foot-pounds.
parameters.treatment:
The different treatments tried:
none (control), Heat (via blow torch), Acetone/ATF,
AeroKroil, Liquid Wrench, PB Blaster, Royal
Purple, and WD-40.

description:
Description
The channel Project Farm on YouTube investigated penetrating oils and other
options for loosening rusty bolts. Eight options were evaluated, including a
control group, to determine which was most effective.
title: What's the best way to loosen a rusty bolt?
